description.english: Found the three golden items!
description.french: Trouver les trois objets dorés.
description.spanish: Encuentra los tres objetos dorados.
description.schinese: 找到三个黄金物品！
description.tchinese: 找到三個黃金物品！
description.japanese: ゴールデンアイテムを3つ見つけた！
description.brazilian: Encontrou os três itens dourados!

description.english: Found The Splisher!
description.french: Trouver l'arrosateur.
description.spanish: Encuentra la Splashadora.
description.schinese: 找到溅水器！
description.tchinese: 找到濺水器！
description.japanese: スプリッシャーを見つけた！
description.brazilian: Encontrou o splisher!

description.english: Found the Bleep Blooper!
description.french: Trouver le Bip-boppeur.
description.spanish: Encuentra el Bipbup.
description.schinese: 找到哔哩卟噜控制器！
description.tchinese: 找到嗶嗶啵啵控制器！
description.japanese: ピピピットを見つけた！
description.brazilian: Encontrou o bleep blooper!

description.english: Found all of Barian's books
description.french: Trouver tous les livres de Barian.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los libros de Barian.
description.schinese: 找到全部巴里安的书
description.tchinese: 找到所有巴利安的書
description.japanese: バリアンの本を全部見つけた
description.brazilian: Encontrou todos os livros de Barian.

description.english: Visit all three Grombi Isles
description.french: Visiter les trois Îles Grombi.
description.spanish: Visita las tres islas Grombi.
description.schinese: 到访所有格隆比群岛（共三个）
description.tchinese: 拜訪所有葛羅比群島（共三個）
description.japanese: グロンビ諸島の島3つすべてを訪れる
description.brazilian: Visitou as três Ilhas Grombi.

displayName.brazilian: Quem tem boca vai a Roma

description.english: Talk to all the Chunkos of the Isles
description.german: Mit Allen Chunkos Der Inseln Sprechen
description.french: Parler à tous les Chunkos des îles.
description.koreana: 섬에 있는 모든 덩어리 인간들과 대화했습니다
description.spanish: Habla con todos los chunko de las islas.
description.schinese: 与岛上所有的胖球们交谈
description.tchinese: 和島上所有的胖球們交談
description.japanese: 諸島のチュンコ全員と話す
description.brazilian: Falou com todos os Chunkos das ilhas.

description.english: Caused a disaster
description.french: Provoquer une catastrophe.
description.spanish: Provoca un desastre.
description.schinese: 引发了一场灾难
description.tchinese: 引發一場災難
description.japanese: 災害を引き起こした
description.brazilian: Causou um desastre.

description.english: Gave the Snek statue it's favourite food
description.french: Donner à la statue de Serpan son repas préféré.
description.koreana: 스네크 동상이 가장 좋아하는 음식을 바쳤습니다
description.spanish: Dale a la estatua de la Cerpiente su comida favorita.
description.schinese: 给蛇鱼雕像投喂它最喜欢的食物
description.tchinese: 給予蛇魚雕像它最喜歡的食物
description.japanese: スネックの像の大好物をあげた
description.brazilian: Deu à estátua de Snek sua comida favorita.

displayName.japanese: ファースト・フルーティ

description.english: Come first in all the Hoverbike races
description.french: Remporter toutes les courses d'aérocycle.
description.spanish: Queda en primera posición en todas las carreras de motos.
description.schinese: 在所有悬浮车比赛中获得第一
description.tchinese: 在所有的懸浮車比賽中獲得第一
description.japanese: ホバーバイクのレースすべてで1位になる
description.brazilian: Chegou em primeiro em todas as corridas de hoverbike.

description.english: Spent two minutes in the Scruz Club
description.german: Zwei Minuten Im Scruz Club Verbracht
description.french: Passer deux minutes au Club Scruz.
description.spanish: Pasa dos minutos en el club Zarrapa.
description.schinese: 在斯克鲁兹俱乐部待5分钟
description.tchinese: 在斯克魯茲俱樂部待2分鐘
description.japanese: スクラズクラブで2分間過ごした
description.brazilian: Passou dois minutos no Scruz Club.

description.english: Rode the Monorail around the whole island
description.german: Mit Der Einschienenbahn Um Die Ganze Insel Gefahren
description.french: Faire le tour de l'île en monorail.
description.spanish: Recorre toda la isla en monorraíl.
description.schinese: 乘坐单轨列车环游整座岛屿
description.tchinese: 搭乘單軌列車環島
description.japanese: モノレールで島全体を移動した
description.brazilian: Andou de monotrilho por toda a ilha.

description.english: Helped the Weech with her brew
description.german: Der Weech Mit Ihrem Gebräu Geholfen
description.french: Aider la Shorshière avec sa concoction.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Brooj a preparar el brebaje.
description.schinese: 帮助威奇调制她的饮料
description.tchinese: 幫助威奇製作她的飲料
description.japanese: ウィーチの醸造を手伝った
description.brazilian: Ajudou Weech com sua bebida.

displayName.english: I Can See My House From Here!
displayName.german: Ich Kann Mein Haus Von Hier Aus Sehen!
displayName.japanese: ここから私の家が見える！
displayName.brazilian: Eu consigo ver minha casa daqui!

description.english: Reach the highest point in the Grombi Isles
description.german: Den Höchsten Punkt Der Grombi-Inseln Erreicht
description.french: Atteindre le point le plus élevé des Îles Grombi.
description.koreana: 그롬비 제도에서 가장 높은 곳에 도달했습니다
description.spanish: Llega al punto más alto de las islas Grombi.
description.schinese: 到达格隆比群岛的最高点
description.tchinese: 抵達葛羅比群島的最高點
description.japanese: グロンビ諸島で一番高い場所に到達
description.brazilian: Chegou ao ponto mais alto das Ilhas Grombi.

description.english: Fall for more than three seconds in one go
description.german: Länger Als Eine Sekunde Am Stück Fallen
description.french: Tomber pendant plus de trois secondes en une fois.
description.spanish: Déjate caer durante más de un segundo.
description.schinese: 一次性下落超过1秒
description.tchinese: 一次性墜落超過1秒鐘
description.japanese: 1度に3秒間以上落下する
description.brazilian: Caia por mais de três segundos sem parar.

description.english: Join the Grombi's in the factory conveyor belt for twenty seconds
description.german: Zwanzig Sekunden Lang Den Grombis Auf Dem Fabrik-Förderband Beitreten
description.french: Rejoindre le Grombi dans le convoyeur de l'usine pendant vingt secondes.
description.koreana: 그롬비의 공장 컨베이어 벨트에 20초 동안 있었습니다
description.spanish: Ponte en la cinta transportadora con los grombi de la fábrica durante 20 segundos.
description.schinese: 在工厂传送带上与格隆比们一起待20秒
description.tchinese: 在工廠的運輸帶上和葛羅比們一起待20秒
description.japanese: グロンビの工場内コンベアーベルトに20秒間参加する
description.brazilian: Junte-se aos Grombi na esteira da fábrica por vinte segundos.

description.english: Complete Mayli's delivery
description.french: Terminer les livraisons de Mayli.
description.spanish: Termina las entregas de Carty.
description.schinese: 帮助梅莉完成送货
description.tchinese: 完成梅利的送貨任務
description.japanese: メイリの配達を完了する
description.brazilian: Conclua as entregas de Mayli.

displayName.japanese: キノコで生キノコろう

description.english: Jump on all springy Mushrooms
description.french: Sauter sur tous les champignons élastiques.
description.spanish: Salta en todas las elastisetas.
description.schinese: 在所有弹跳蘑菇上跳跃
description.tchinese: 在所有的彈跳蘑菇上跳躍過
description.japanese: すべてのバネキノコで跳ねる
description.brazilian: Pule em todos os cogumelos elásticos.

displayName.japanese: 遊覧飛行でらくらく移動

description.english: Throw yourself from every Springy Tree
description.german: Sich Von Jedem Federnden Baum Stürzen
description.french: Vous jeter depuis tous les arbres élastiques.
description.koreana: 모든 통통 나무 위에서 몸을 던졌습니다
description.spanish: Lánzate desde todos los árboles catapulta.
description.schinese: 从每棵弹簧树上跳下
description.tchinese: 從每棵彈簧樹上跳下過
description.japanese: すべてのバネツリーから身を投げ出す
description.brazilian: Jogue-se de cada árvore elástica.

description.english: Grow every plant to full size in the Grombi Isles
description.german: Jede Pflanze Auf Den Grombi-Inseln Zu Voller Größe Wachsen Lassen
description.french: Faire pousser toutes les plantes des Îles Grombi au maximum.
description.koreana: 그롬비 제도에 있는 모든 식물을 최대 크기로 키웠습니다
description.spanish: Cultiva todas las plantas de las islas Grombi hasta que crezcan del todo.
description.schinese: 将格隆比群岛上的每种植物培育到最大尺寸
description.tchinese: 將葛羅比島上的各種植物培育到最大尺寸
description.japanese: グロンビ諸島の植物すべてを最大サイズまで栽培する
description.brazilian: Cultive cada planta das Ilhas Grombi até seu tamanho máximo.

description.english: Use the Bleep Blooper on every panel at least once
description.german: Den Bleep Blooper Mindestens Einmal Auf Jedem Panel Verwenden
description.french: Utiliser le Bip-boppeur sur chaque panneau au moins une fois.
description.spanish: Usa el Bipbup en todos los paneles al menos una vez.
description.schinese: 在每块面板上至少使用一次哔哩卟噜控制器
description.tchinese: 在每一塊面板上都至少使用過一次嗶嗶啵啵控制器
description.japanese: すべてのパネルで1回以上ピピピットを使う
description.brazilian: Use o bleep blooper em cada painel ao menos uma vez.

description.english: Successfully restored two Elektro rings
description.french: Restaurer deux anneaux élektros.
description.spanish: Restaura dos anillos elektro.
description.schinese: 成功修复两个电灵环
description.tchinese: 成功修復兩個電子環
description.japanese: 2つのエレクトロリングの回復に成功した
description.brazilian: Restaurou com sucesso dois anéis Elektro.

description.english: Restored Full Power back to the Grombi Isles
description.german: Volle Stromversorgung Auf Den Grombi-Inseln Wiederhergestellt
description.french: Restaurer complètement le courant des Îles Grombis.
description.spanish: Restaura por completo la corriente de las islas Grombi.
description.schinese: 恢复格隆比群岛的全部能量
description.tchinese: 恢復葛羅比群島的所有能量
description.japanese: グロンビ諸島の最大パワーを取り戻した
description.brazilian: Restaurou totalmente a energia nas Ilhas Grombi.

displayName.japanese: どうしたと云うんだい、ホームズ？
displayName.brazilian: Ora, ora, parece que temos um Xeroque Romes aqui!

description.english: Solved the case!
description.french: Résoudre l'affaire.
description.spanish: Resuelve el caso.
description.schinese: 解决案件！
description.tchinese: 解決案件！
description.japanese: 事件解決！
description.brazilian: Solucionou o caso!

displayName.japanese: ジャスティス・リーグ

description.english: Brought Plonto to Justice
description.french: Mener Plonto devant la justice.
description.spanish: Lleva a Plonto ante la justicia.
description.schinese: 将普隆托绳之以法
description.tchinese: 將普隆特繩之以法
description.japanese: プロントに裁きを受けさせた
description.brazilian: Levou Plonto à justiça.

description.english: Deposited Every Elektro
description.french: Déposer tous les élektros.
description.spanish: Lleva de vuelta a todos los elektro.
description.schinese: 存放所有电灵
description.tchinese: 將所有電子收管好
description.japanese: すべてのエレクトロを格納した
description.brazilian: Depositou cada Elektro.
